description: Given a set of cities and an asymmetric distance matrix (or coordinates with ATT distance), find the roundtrip (tour) of minimal total distance that visits each city exactly once and returns to the starting city.

instance_file.format: The instance file follows the TSPLib format. It can either include an explicit 'EDGE_WEIGHT_SECTION' or provide a 'NODE_COORD_SECTION' with coordinates, along with an 'EDGE_WEIGHT_TYPE' specifying 'ATT'.

tour.description: An ordered list of city indices representing the tour.

objective.function: Total Distance = sum_{i=1}^{n-1}(d(tour[i-1], tour[i])) + d(tour[n-1], tour[0])
objective.description: Minimize the total travel distance of the tour.

solution_representation: A list of integers representing the order in which cities are visited.
creator: Rastion
